page.description: Define the HTML page to embed in the UX Component.

discussion.p: The *[ui:HTML Document Properties]* define the HTML content to embed in the component. The content must be contained in an HTML file in the web project. This option is only available when the Embedded Object Properties [Object type] is set to "Static HTML Page".

description.p: The HTML file in the web project to display.

link.link: ux control properties embedded object properties object type
